item.title: China is leading the fight against hidden car door handles
item.description: The Chinese government issued a new rule that goes into effect January 1, 2027.

item.title: Adobe Animate is shutting down as company focuses on AI
item.description: Adobe Animate will be discontinued on March 1, 2026, as Adobe shifts its focus to AI.

item.title: What Snowflake’s deal with OpenAI tells us about the enterprise AI race
item.description: Snowflake is the latest enterprise to sign multi-year deals with multiple AI companies in what could be a sign to come of a future trend.
